name: Brazilian Classical Music
description: Originated in the late 19th century, taking the European music that had been brought to the country by colonists and brought in parts of Brazilian Music.

children.name: Valsa brasileira
children.description: Brazillian Waltz characterized by its slow rhythms and romantic sound.
